name: Rusted
preview: Rusted is an action-adventure platformer game created by a member of BIIG Armada and his teammates.
description: Rusted is an action-adventure platformer game created by a member of BIIG Armada and his teammates. It immerses the player in a story of a robot that was deemed defective by society. He then goes after the ones that sentenced him to his demise once he has repaired himself.

name: Amenitinn
preview: An online marketplace for homestays and lodging for vacations. Find your ideal vacation location or make yours available.

name: The IVth Wall
preview: The IVth Wall is a movie and tv database. It displays data of movies and tv series, using APIs to update records displayed.

name: Blinded Getaway
